LEARNING RESOURCES

Learning Resources is a leading global manufacturer of hands-on educational resources which are trusted by teachers and parents and loved by children.

Their high-quality resources and school supplies are sold in more than 80 countries and they've won many awards for their innovative products.

Learning Resources works closely with educators. They get input from teachers for designing their products which are up-to-date with the latest curricula.

Their products make education fun for children, teachers and parents and are suitable for use in both the home and in classrooms!
